attributes.action: RETURN ILLEGAL IMMIGRANTS IMMEDIATELY CAUGHT CROSSING ENGLISH CHANNEL.
attributes.additional_details:
The situation is out of control. The immigrants are NOT refugees seeking safe asylum. They were safe in mainland Europe but desire the benefits the UK provides.
Many threaten to drown themselves if forced to accept French intervention at sea. Allowing safe completion of their journey to UK land, MUST not be reason for illegal entrants continued residence here, which makes an otherwise mockery of the efforts of legal applicants.
attributes.background: Any immigrant who crosses the English channel and enters England illegally from France, whether by water, land or air, MUST, without delay, be immediately returned to France, without interview, delay or further detention.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321862
